data.title: Norman's Family History
data.meta_description:
Hi, 
 
My fourth great grandfather ( William Norman)is buried in Derbyshire, England. 
I would like to find information on him and his parents. His father was John Norman and mother name was Sarah last name unknown. I would like to find out what her maiden name was. William Norman was born 1780  Pentrich, Derby, England and he married Hannah Alsop. If anyone has information on this family I would be much appreciated.  
 
Thanks, 
Donna
data.text:
Hi,

My fourth great grandfather ( William Norman)is buried in Derbyshire, England.

I would like to find information on him and his parents. His father was John Norman and mother name was Sarah last name unknown. I would like to find out what her maiden name was. William Norman was born 1780 Pentrich, Derby, England and he married Hannah Alsop. If anyone has information on this family I would be much appreciated.

Thanks,

Donna

Donna,

Have you looked at the Pentrich Historical Society website? I did a quick search and quite a few NORMAN references popped up - it could be useful for you.

There are also these 4 NORMAN Monumental Inscriptions for St Matthew, Pentrich:

NORMAN ANN wife of John NORMAN born 3rd September 1783, died 21st September 1861

NORMAN John late of White Lee born 23rd March 1760 died 16 April 1832

NORMAN John son of William Henry & Catherine died 9 February 1848, aged 4 months.

NORMAN Samuel Grundy son of William Henry and Catherine died 6 December 1850, aged 7 months.

There is also the marriage in Phillimores Marriage Index of Pentrich of a Daniel NORMAN to an Eliz. COWPER, by licence on 5 June 1759 - perhaps they could be the parents of the John NORMAN born 1760.

Janet
